description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Marauder Madness is an arcade style shooter featuring pirate ships created by students at the University of New Mexico.   Destroy the merchant ships to plunder their gold, but be careful, too much looting and the destroyers will be hunting for you.  Play alone in 21 campaign levels or against up to 3 players in a local match.
description.short: Marauder Madness is an arcade style shooter featuring pirate ships created by students at the University of New Mexico.   Destroy the merchant ships to plunder their gold, but be careful, too much looting and the destroyers will be hunting for you.  Play alone in 21 campaign levels or against up to 3 players in a local match.
